mapper.sql:
where a.postid=d.postid and b.companyid = d.companyid and c.deptid = d.deptid
and d.postname like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{parameters.postname},'%'))
and b.companyid=#{parameters.companyid}
and a.postid=#{parameters.postidofquota}
and c.deptid in (#{parameters.deptid})
AND c.deptcode LIKE CONCAT(#{parameters.deptcode},'%')
AND b.companycode LIKE CONCAT(#{parameters.companycode},'%')
mapper.select: select count(1) from h_o_quota a,h_o_company b,h_o_department c,h_o_post d
select count(quotaid) from h_e_position t where t.quotaid=#{quotaid} and isstaff=1 AND t.startdate <=sysdate AND (t.enddate >sysdate OR t.enddate is null)

select count(t.postionguid) from h_e_position t,h_e_employee a where t.deptid in (select deptid from h_o_department where deptcode like CONCAT(#{deptcode},'%')) and t.isstaff=1 AND t.startdate <=sysdate AND (t.enddate >sysdate OR t.enddate is null) and a.workstate in(0,1) and t.employeeid=a.employeeid
select quotaid, quotacode, postid, budgettype, budgetnumber, budgetdate, state, memo, modiuser, moditimestamp, modimemo from h_o_quota where postid=#{postid} order by quotacode
mapper.insert: insert into h_o_quota (quotaid, quotacode, postid, budgettype, budgetnumber, budgetdate, state, memo, modiuser, moditimestamp, modimemo, processinstanceid) values (#{quotaid}, #{quotacode}, #{postid}, #{budgettype}, #{budgetnumber}, #{budgetdate}, #{state}, #{memo:VARCHAR}, #{modiuser}, #{moditimestamp}, #{modimemo:VARCHAR}, #{processinstanceid:VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update h_o_quota set quotaid = #{quotaid}, quotacode = #{quotacode}, postid = #{postid}, budgettype = #{budgettype}, budgetnumber = #{budgetnumber}, budgetdate = #{budgetdate}, state = #{state}, memo = #{memo:VARCHAR}, modiuser = #{modiuser}, moditimestamp = #{moditimestamp}, modimemo = #{modimemo:VARCHAR}, processinstanceid=#{processinstanceid:VARCHAR} where quotaid = #{quotaid}
mapper.select: select quotaid, quotacode, postid, budgettype, budgetnumber, budgetdate, state, memo, modiuser, moditimestamp, modimemo, processinstanceid from h_o_quota where quotaid=#{quotaid}
select quotaid, quotacode, postid, budgettype, budgetnumber, budgetdate, state, memo, modiuser, moditimestamp, modimemo, processinstanceid from h_o_quota where processinstanceid=#{processinstanceid}

select a.quotaid, a.quotacode, a.postid, a.budgettype, a.budgetnumber, a.budgetdate, a.state, a.memo, a.modiuser, a.moditimestamp, a.modimemo from h_o_quota a, h_o_budgettype b where a.postid=#{postid} and a.state=#{state} and b.budgettypename=#{budgettype} and a.budgettype=b.budgettypeid
select decode(sum(t.Postnum),null,0,sum(t.Postnum)) as postnumber from J_RecruitProgram t where t.quotaid=#{quotaid} and t.state=2

select decode(sum(t.budgetnumber),null,0,sum(t.budgetnumber)) as quotanumber from h_o_quota t where postid in(select postid from H_O_Post a,h_o_department b where a.deptid=b.deptid and b.deptcode like CONCAT(#{deptcode},'%'))
select decode(sum(t.OperateNum),null,0,sum(t.OperateNum)) as operatenum from J_QuotaOperate t where t.quotaid=#{quotaid} and t.operatestate=3
mapper.insert: insert into j_quotaoperate (quotaoperateguid, quotaid, operatestate, modiuser, moditimestamp, modimemo, operatenum) values (#{quotaoperateguid}, #{quotaid:VARCHAR}, #{operatestate}, #{modiuser}, #{moditimestamp}, #{modimemo:VARCHAR}, #{operatenum})
mapper.delete: delete j_quotaoperate where quotaid in(select quotaid from H_O_Quota where postid=#{postid})
mapper.select: select count(postid) from h_e_position t where t.postid in (select postid from h_o_post where interfacecode=#{code} and state=1) and isstaff=1 AND t.startdate <=sysdate AND (t.enddate >sysdate OR t.enddate is null)

select a.budgettype, (SELECT H_O_BudgetType.Budgettypename FROM H_O_BudgetType where a.Budgettype = H_O_BudgetType.Budgettypeid) as Budgettypename, sum(a.budgetnumber) as budgetnumber from h_o_quota a where a.postid in(select postid from h_o_post where interfacecode=#{code} and state=1) group by a.budgettype
